meanings.sent3: The nonworking toaster decided to take a break.
meanings.sent4: The nonworking engine was like a sleeping giant.
meanings.sent5: The nonworking machine sat silently in the corner.

meanings.sent1: She was nonworking after losing her job.
meanings.sent2: The nonworking man searched for employment.
meanings.sent3: The nonworking clown juggled imaginary balls.
meanings.sent4: His nonworking status made him feel adrift.
meanings.sent5: The nonworking individual sought new opportunities.

meanings.definition: Not producing any results or effects
meanings.sent2: The nonworking strategy led to no success.
meanings.sent3: The nonworking potion turned the wizard purple.
meanings.sent4: Her nonworking efforts were like shouting into the wind.
meanings.sent5: The nonworking idea faded into obscurity.
